NOMINATION_POOL.title: Select active pool
NOMINATION_POOL.description: It is recommended that you select an active pool with the Earning status to earn staking rewards

NOMINATION_POOL.title: Unstake and withdraw
NOMINATION_POOL.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw after a period of {periodNumb}. Keep in mind that these actions are not automated and will incur network fees

NOMINATION_POOL.title: Keep your transferable balance
NOMINATION_POOL.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

NOMINATION_POOL.title: Claim your rewards
NOMINATION_POOL.description: Your staking rewards will be paid out every {paidOut} hour. Make sure to claim them manually

NOMINATION_POOL.title: Track your stake
NOMINATION_POOL.description: Keep an eye on your stake periodically, as rewards and staking status can fluctuate over time

NATIVE_STAKING.title: Select {validatorNumber} {validatorType}
NATIVE_STAKING.description: It is recommended that you select {validatorNumber} {validatorType} to optimize your staking rewards

NATIVE_STAKING.title: Unstake and withdraw
NATIVE_STAKING.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw after a period of {periodNumb}. Keep in mind that these actions are not automated and will incur network fees

NATIVE_STAKING.title: Keep your transferable balance
NATIVE_STAKING.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

NATIVE_STAKING.title: Check your rewards
NATIVE_STAKING.description: Your staking rewards will be paid out every {paidOut} hour and will be automatically compounded to your stake

NATIVE_STAKING.title: Manage your stake
NATIVE_STAKING.description: You need to monitor your stake constantly and change {validatorType} when needed as staking status can fluctuate over time

LIQUID_STAKING.title: Receive {derivative}
LIQUID_STAKING.description: You will receive {derivative} as a representation of your staked {inputToken}

LIQUID_STAKING.title: Unstake and withdraw
LIQUID_STAKING.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw immediately with a higher fee or wait {periodNumb} before withdrawing with a lower fee

LIQUID_STAKING.title: Keep your transferable balance
LIQUID_STAKING.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals.

LIQUID_STAKING.title: Check your {derivative}
LIQUID_STAKING.description: The amount of {derivative} doesn’t increase over time, only its value in {inputToken} does. This means that by the time you decide to withdraw {inputToken} from {derivative}, your {derivative} should be worth more than your originally staked {inputToken}

LIQUID_STAKING.title: Track your APY
LIQUID_STAKING.description: Keep an eye on your stake as APY can fluctuate over time. APY fluctuation is determined by the protocol beyond SubWallet’s control

LENDING.title: Receive {derivative}
LENDING.description: You will receive {derivative} as a representation of your supplied {inputToken}

LENDING.title: Withdraw anytime
LENDING.description: Once supplied, your funds will be locked. Withdraw your funds anytime with a fee

LENDING.title: Keep your transferable balance
LENDING.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, unstaking, and withdrawals

LENDING.title: Check your {derivative}
LENDING.description: The amount of {derivative} doesn’t increase over time, only its value in {inputToken} does. This means that by the time you decide to withdraw {inputToken} from {derivative}, your {derivative} should be worth more than your originally supplied {inputToken}

LENDING.title: Track your APY
LENDING.description: Keep an eye on your supply as APY can fluctuate over time. APY fluctuation is determined by the protocol beyond SubWallet’s control

DAPP_STAKING.title: Select {validatorNumber} dApps
DAPP_STAKING.description: It is recommended that you select {validatorNumber} dApp to optimize your staking rewards

DAPP_STAKING.title: Unstake and withdraw
DAPP_STAKING.description: Once staked, your funds will be locked. Unstake your funds anytime and withdraw after a period of {periodNumb}. Keep in mind that these actions are not automated and will incur network fees

DAPP_STAKING.title: Keep your transferable balance
DAPP_STAKING.description: Ensure that your transferable balance includes a minimum of {maintainBalance} {maintainSymbol} to cover your existential deposit and network fees associated with staking, reward claiming, unstaking and withdrawals

DAPP_STAKING.title: Claim your rewards
DAPP_STAKING.description: Your staking rewards will be paid out every {paidOut} hour. Make sure to claim them manually

DAPP_STAKING.title: Track your stake
DAPP_STAKING.description: Keep an eye on your stake periodically, as rewards and staking status can fluctuate over time.

unbondExtraInfo.title: Wait time
unbondExtraInfo.description: Once unstaked, your funds will become available for withdrawal after {unBondedTime}

unbondExtraInfo.title: No rewards
unbondExtraInfo.description: During the unstaking period of {unBondedTime}, your tokens produce no rewards

unbondExtraInfo.title: Manual withdrawal
unbondExtraInfo.description: Keep in mind that you need to withdraw manually after the wait time is over
